GSD.product_version: versions from v4.16 to before v5.10.166
GSD.description:
cifs: Fix oops due to uncleared server->smbd_conn in reconnect

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.166 by commit e037baee16e0b9ace7e730888fcae9cec11daff2, it was introduced in version v4.16 by commit 8ef130f9ec27973f7b49e20c5a3b9134ca33026c. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: cifs: Fix oops due to uncleared server->smbd_conn in reconnect
